ct:Test.name: AbsValueIsOne
ct:Test.description: The value should be: '1' or: '-1'

ct:Test.name: AllC1Range05To1p5
ct:Test.description: All array values of C1 should range from 0.5 to 1.5

ct:Test.name: AllC1Range03To1p7
ct:Test.description: All array values of C1 should range from 0.3 to 1.7

ct:Test.name: AllC2Range01To1
ct:Test.description: All array values of C2 should range from 0.1 to 1.0

ct:Test.name: AllC3Range05To1p5
ct:Test.description: All array values of C3 should range from 0.5 to 1.5

ct:Test.name: AllC3Range0To1p5
ct:Test.description: All array values of C3 should range from 0.0 to 1.5

ct:Test.name: AllC4Range09To1p1
ct:Test.description: All array values of C4 should range from 0.9 to 1.1

ct:Test.name: AtLeastOneElement
ct:Test.description: There should be at least one element

ct:Test.name: BooleanBinTest
ct:Test.description: The value should be True: '1' or False: '0'

ct:Test.name: BooleanXmlTest
ct:Test.description: The value should be 'true', 'false', 'True', 'False', 'TRUE', 'FALSE', '1', or '0'

ct:Tests.ct:Test: str(.) == "true" || str(.)=="false" || str(.) == "True" || str(.)=="False" || str(.) == "TRUE" || str(.)=="FALSE" || str(.) == "1" || str(.)=="0"

ct:Test.name: BooleanXmlTrueTest
ct:Test.description: The value should be 'true', 'True' 'TRUE', or '1'

ct:Test.name: CheckForCommissioningApproval
ct:Test.description: The value should be 'CommissioningApproved'

ct:Test.name: CrcCountCheckRS
ct:Test.description: The num_rs_isps field in the SPH should equal the sum of Transfer Frame Reed Solomon corrections over all data sets

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/wind_velocity), add(/wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), add(/laser_diode_temperature, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), add(/instr_response_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), add(/instr_spec_reg, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), add(/instr_auto_test, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), add(/dark_current_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), add(/instr_defocus_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), add(/phase_adjustment, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), add(/offline_wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), add(/dark_current_mem_zone, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), add(/nop_udm, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), add(/laser_beam_monitoring, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_rs_correction) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0)

ct:Test.name: CrcCountCheckTransferFrames
ct:Test.description: The num_tf_crc_error_isps field in the SPH should equal the sum of Transfer Frames with CRC errors over all data sets

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/wind_velocity), add(/wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), add(/laser_diode_temperature, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), add(/instr_response_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), add(/instr_spec_reg, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), add(/instr_auto_test, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), add(/dark_current_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), add(/instr_defocus_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), add(/phase_adjustment, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), add(/offline_wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), add(/dark_current_mem_zone, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), add(/nop_udm, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), add(/laser_beam_monitoring, count(./source_packet_info, int(./num_tf_with_crc_error) != 0 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0)

ct:Test.name: CrcCountSPInvalid
ct:Test.description: The num_isp_crc_errors field in the SPH should equal the sum of ISPs with SP CRC errors or incorrect SP length or errors in key header fields over all data sets

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/wind_velocity), add(/wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), add(/laser_diode_temperature, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), add(/instr_response_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), add(/instr_spec_reg, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), add(/instr_auto_test, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), add(/dark_current_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), add(/instr_defocus_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), add(/phase_adjustment, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), add(/offline_wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), add(/dark_current_mem_zone, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), add(/nop_udm, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), add(/laser_beam_monitoring, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_invalid) == 1 && int(./sp_missing) == 0)), 0)

ct:Test.name: CrcCountSPMissing
ct:Test.description: The number_missing_isps field in the SPH should equal the sum of missing ISPs over all data sets

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/wind_velocity), add(/wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), add(/laser_diode_temperature, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), add(/instr_response_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), add(/instr_spec_reg, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), add(/instr_auto_test, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), add(/dark_current_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), add(/instr_defocus_cal, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), add(/phase_adjustment, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), add(/offline_wind_velocity, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), add(/dark_current_mem_zone, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), add(/nop_udm, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), add(/laser_beam_monitoring, count(./source_packet_info, int(./sp_missing) == 1)), 0)

ct:Test.name: CrcRSSignificant
ct:Test.description: This flag should only be set if the error exceeds the treshold

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(int(../num_rs_isps) >= 34.0 * (if(exists(/wind_velocity), numelements(/wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), numelements(/laser_diode_temperature), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), numelements(/instr_response_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), numelements(/instr_spec_reg), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), numelements(/instr_auto_test), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), numelements(/dark_current_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), numelements(/instr_defocus_cal), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), numelements(/phase_adjustment), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), numelements(/offline_wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), numelements(/dark_current_mem_zone), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), numelements(/nop_udm), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), numelements(/laser_beam_monitoring), 0)) * float(../rs_thresh) * 0.01, 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: CrcSPInvalidSignificant
ct:Test.description: This flag should only be set if the error exceeds the treshold

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(int(../num_isp_crc_errors) >= 34.0 * (if(exists(/wind_velocity), numelements(/wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), numelements(/laser_diode_temperature), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), numelements(/instr_response_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), numelements(/instr_spec_reg), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), numelements(/instr_auto_test), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), numelements(/dark_current_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), numelements(/instr_defocus_cal), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), numelements(/phase_adjustment), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), numelements(/offline_wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), numelements(/dark_current_mem_zone), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), numelements(/nop_udm), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), numelements(/laser_beam_monitoring), 0)) * float(../isp_crc_thresh) * 0.01, 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: CrcTransferFramesSignificant
ct:Test.description: This flag should only be set if the error exceeds the treshold

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(int(../num_tf_crc_error_isps) >= 34.0 * (if(exists(/wind_velocity), numelements(/wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), numelements(/laser_diode_temperature), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), numelements(/instr_response_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), numelements(/instr_spec_reg), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), numelements(/instr_auto_test), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), numelements(/dark_current_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), numelements(/instr_defocus_cal), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), numelements(/phase_adjustment), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), numelements(/offline_wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), numelements(/dark_current_mem_zone), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), numelements(/nop_udm), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), numelements(/laser_beam_monitoring), 0)) * float(../tf_crc_error_isps_thresh) * 0.01, 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: CTILOSParameterSet
ct:Test.description: A CTI_LOS___ product should contain 4 ASTA parameters and/or 4 ASTB parameters

ct:Test.name: EVSourceEnum
ct:Test.description: The plan event source should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckEEF
ct:Test.description: The name of the EEF file should be consistent with the product name in the fixed header

ct:Test.name: FileNameCheckHDR
ct:Test.description: The name of the HDR file should be consistent with the product name in the fixed header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchCreationDate
ct:Test.description: The creation date in the product name should be consistent with the creation date field in the header

ct:Tests.ct:Test: substr(19, 15, str(.)) == substr(4, 4, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(9, 2, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(12, 5, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(18, 2, str(../Source/Creation_Date)) + substr(21, 2, str(../Source/Creation_Date))

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileClass
ct:Test.description: The file class in the product name should be consistent with the file class field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileType
ct:Test.description: The file type in the product name should be consistent with the file type field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileVersionAt35
ct:Test.description: The file version in the product name should be consistent with the file version field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileVersionAt51
ct:Test.description: The file version in the product name should be consistent with the file version field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchFileVersionAt55
ct:Test.description: The file version in the product name should be consistent with the file version field in the header

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchValidityStart
ct:Test.description: The validity start time in the product name should be consistent with the validity start time field in the header

ct:Tests.ct:Test: substr(19, 15, str(.)) == substr(4, 4, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Start)) + substr(9, 2, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Start)) + substr(12, 5, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Start)) + substr(18, 2, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Start)) + substr(21, 2, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Start))

ct:Test.name: FileNameMatchValidityStop
ct:Test.description: The validity stop time in the product name should be consistent with the validity stop time field in the header

ct:Tests.ct:Test: substr(35, 15, str(.)) == substr(4, 4, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Stop)) + substr(9, 2, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Stop)) + substr(12, 5, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Stop)) + substr(18, 2, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Stop)) + substr(21, 2, str(../Validity_Period/Validity_Stop))

ct:Test.name: KmieWithinRange
ct:Test.description: All Kmie values should be within range 1.2e12 to 1.5e13

ct:Test.name: KrayWithinRange
ct:Test.description: All Kray values should be within range 0.5e13 to 4.5e13

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfMeasurementsInValid
ct:Test.description: The number of invalid measurements should be less than 2 percent

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdUsMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_us should be missing (equal to 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdVsMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_vs should be missing (equal to 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdPsMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_ps should be missing (equal to 2147483647)

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdErrPsMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_err_ps should be missing (equal to > 1.683e38)

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdZsMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_zs should be missing (equal to 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdPbaseMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_pbase should be missing (equal to 4294967295)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_pbase) == 4294967295))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdPtopMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_ptop should be missing (equal to 4294967295)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_ptop) == 4294967295))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdPnomMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_pnom should be missing (equal to 4294967295)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_pnom) == 4294967295))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdZbaseMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_zbase should be missing (equal to 2147483647)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_zbase) == 2147483647))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdZtopMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_ztop should be missing (equal to 2147483647)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_ztop) == 2147483647))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdZnomMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_znom should be missing (equal to 2147483647)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_znom) == 2147483647))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdTMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_t should be missing (equal to 65535)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_t) == 65535))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdErrTMissing

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_err_t) == 65535))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdErrRhMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_err_rh should be missing (equal to >1.683e38)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, float(./amd_err_rh) > 1.683E38))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdQMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_q should be missing (equal to >1.683e38)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, float(./amd_q) == 32767))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdCcMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_cc should be missing (equal to 255)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, int(./amd_cc) == 255))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdClwcMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_clwc be missing (equal to >1.683e38)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, float(./amd_clwc) > 1.683E38))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThan2PercentOfAmdCiwcMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 2 percent of amd_ciwc be missing (equal to >1.683e38)

ct:Tests.ct:Test: add(., numelements(./profile_data)) == 0 || float(add(., count(./profile_data, float(./amd_ciwc) > 1.683E38))) / float(add(., numelements(./profile_data))) < 0.02

ct:Test.name: LessThanOnePercentOfMieWindVelocityMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 1 percent of mie_wind_velocity should be missing (value 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThanOnePercentOfRayleighWindVelocityMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 1 percent of rayleigh_wind_velocity should be missing (value 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThanOnePercentOfBackgroundZonalWindVelocityMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 1 percent of background_zonal_wind_velocity should be missing (value 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThanOnePercentOfBackgroundMeridionalWindVelocityMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 1 percent of background_meridional_wind_velocity should be missing (value 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThanOnePercentOfAnalysisZonalWindVelocityMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 1 percent of analysis_zonal_wind_velocity should be missing (value 32767)

ct:Test.name: LessThanOnePercentOfAnalysisMeridionalWindVelocityMissing
ct:Test.description: Less than 1 percent of analysis_meridional_wind_velocity should be missing (value 32767)

ct:Test.name: MissingIspSignificantCheck
ct:Test.description: This flag should only be set if the error exceeds the treshold

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(int(../number_missing_isps) >= 34.0 * (if(exists(/wind_velocity), numelements(/wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), numelements(/laser_diode_temperature), 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), numelements(/instr_response_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), numelements(/instr_spec_reg), 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), numelements(/instr_auto_test), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), numelements(/dark_current_cal), 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), numelements(/instr_defocus_cal), 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), numelements(/phase_adjustment), 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), numelements(/offline_wind_velocity), 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), numelements(/dark_current_mem_zone), 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), numelements(/nop_udm), 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), numelements(/laser_beam_monitoring), 0)) * float(../missing_isps_thresh) * 0.01, 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: MissingIspSignificant
ct:Test.description: Field should be zero

ct:Test.name: MoreThan98PercentOfMeasurementsValid
ct:Test.description: More than 98 percent of measurements should be valid

ct:Test.name: MoreThan98PercentOfObservationsValid
ct:Test.description: More than 98 percent of observations should be valid

ct:Test.name: MoreThan98PercentOfObservationsValidOrAtMost1Invalid
ct:Test.description: If number of observations > 51, more than 98 percent of these should be valid. Otherwise no more than 1 observation should be invalid.

ct:Test.name: MoreThan98PercentOfUsefulSignalDataQualityValid
ct:Test.description: More than 98 percent of Mie data_quality_flag should be valid or more than 98 percent of Rayleigh data_quality_flag should be valid

ct:Test.name: MoreThanCustomPercentOfUsefulSignalDataQualityValid
ct:Test.description: More than 15 percent of Mie data_quality_flag should be valid or more than 20 percent of Rayleigh data_quality_flag should be valid

ct:Test.name: NumDataSets
ct:Test.description: num_data_sets in MPH should indicate the amount of data sets that are actually present in the product

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/wind_velocity), 1, 0) + if(exists(/laser_diode_temperature), 1, 0) + if(exists(/instr_response_cal), 1, 0) + if(exists(/instr_spec_reg), 1, 0) + if(exists(/instr_auto_test), 1, 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_cal), 1, 0) + if(exists(/instr_defocus_cal), 1, 0) + if(exists(/phase_adjustment), 1, 0) + if(exists(/offline_wind_velocity), 1, 0) + if(exists(/dark_current_mem_zone), 1, 0) + if(exists(/nop_udm), 1, 0) + if(exists(/laser_beam_monitoring), 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: NumDataSetsLevel1A
ct:Test.description: num_data_sets in MPH should indicate the amount of data sets that are actually present in the product

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/geolocation), 1, 0) + if(exists(/data_quality), 1, 0) + if(exists(/reference_pulse), 1, 0) + if(exists(/house_keeping), 1, 0) + if(exists(/mie_measurement), 1, 0) + if(exists(/rayleigh_measurement), 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: NumDataSetsLevel1B_03_05
ct:Test.description: num_data_sets in MPH should indicate the amount of data sets that are actually present in the product

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/geolocation), 1, 0) + if(exists(/product_confidence_data), 1, 0) + if(exists(/ground_wind_detection), 1, 0) + if(exists(/measurement), 1, 0) + if(exists(/calibration_characterization_data), 1, 0) + if(exists(/useful_signal), 1, 0) + if(exists(/wind_velocity), 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: NumDataSetsLevel1B_03_07
ct:Test.description: num_data_sets in MPH should indicate the amount of data sets that are actually present in the product

ct:Tests.ct:Test: int(.) == if(exists(/geolocation), 1, 0) + if(exists(/product_confidence_data), 1, 0) + if(exists(/ground_wind_detection), 1, 0) + if(exists(/measurement), 1, 0) + if(exists(/mie_core_params), 1, 0) + if(exists(/calibration_characterization_data), 1, 0) + if(exists(/useful_signal), 1, 0) + if(exists(/wind_velocity), 1, 0)

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurementsUsedGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_of_mie_measurements_used or num_of_rayleigh_measurements_used should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumMeasurementSpValidGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_mie_measurement_sp_valid or num_rayleigh_measurement_sp_valid should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumObservationsUsedGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_of_mie_observations_used or num_of_rayleigh_observations_used should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumReferencePulsesGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_mie_reference_pulses_present or num_rayleigh_reference_pulses_present should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumReferencePulsesSpValidGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_mie_reference_pulse_sp_valid or num_rayleigh_reference_pulse_sp_valid should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumReferencePulsesUsedGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_of_mie_reference_pulses_used or num_of_rayleigh_reference_pulses_used should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumValidCalibrationResultsGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_of_valid_mie_calibration_results or num_of_valid_rayleigh_calibration_results should be greater than 0

ct:Test.name: NumScaIcaMcaTotGreaterThanZero
ct:Test.description: Either num_prof_sca, num_prof_ica, num_prof_mca or num_group_tot should be greater than zero

ct:Test.name: OptionalRangeLongitude
ct:Test.description: The longitude (in degrees) should be >= 0 and <= 360 if a value is present

ct:Test.name: ParameterNameAllowed
ct:Test.description: The parameter name should match with file type

ct:Test.name: PhysicalFileSizeCheck
ct:Test.description: The value of this field should match the actual file size

ct:Test.name: PIFStatusEnum
ct:Test.description: The status should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Tests.ct:Test: str(.) == "AUTOMATIC" || str(.) == "MANUAL" || str(.) == "VALIDATED" || str(.) == "GENERATED" || str(.) == "COMMITTED" || str(.) == "EXPORTED" || str(.) == "RE-PLANNED" || str(.) == "RE-VALIDATED" || str(.) == "RE-GENERATED" || str(.) == "RE-COMMITTED" || str(.) == "RE-EXPORTED"

ct:Test.name: QCFReportValueRangeTest_Mode
ct:Test.description: The Test_Mode field should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: Range005To01
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 0.05 to 0.1

ct:Test.name: RangeMinus05To05
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from -0.5 to 0.5

ct:Test.name: Range10To109000
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 10 to 109000

ct:Test.name: Range015To03
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 0.15 to 0.3

ct:Test.name: Range0To4
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 0 to 4

ct:Test.name: Range0To100
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 0 to 100

ct:Test.name: Range3To600
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 3 to 600

ct:Test.name: Range3To1003
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 3 to 1003

ct:Test.name: Range3To5
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 3 to 5

ct:Test.name: Range4To5
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 4 to 5

ct:Test.name: Range7To9
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 7 to 9

ct:Test.name: Range8To9
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 8 to 9

ct:Test.name: Range8To10
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 8 to 10

ct:Test.name: RangeMinus10To10
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between -10 to 10

ct:Test.name: Range12To13
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 12 to 13

ct:Test.name: Range12To14
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number between 12 to 14

ct:Test.name: Range17500To33100
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 17500 to 33100

ct:Test.name: Range250To350
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 250 to 350

ct:Test.name: Range350To450
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 350 to 450

ct:Test.name: Range450To550
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 450 to 550

ct:Test.name: Range1400To1600
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 1400 to 1600

ct:Test.name: RangeMinus10000To82000000
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from -10000 to 8200000

ct:Test.name: Range095To1p05
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 0.95 to 1.05

ct:Test.name: Range5E12To1E13
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 5.0E12 to 1.0E13

ct:Test.name: Range5E12To5E13
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 5.0E12 to 5.0E13

ct:Test.name: Range2p5E13To3p5E14
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 2.5E13 to 3.5E14

ct:Test.name: Range5E13To5E14
ct:Test.description: The value should hold a number from 5.0E13 to 5.0E14

ct:Test.name: RangeLatitude6
ct:Test.description: The latitude (in 1E6 degrees) should be >= -90E6 and <= 90E6

ct:Test.name: RangeLongitude6
ct:Test.description: The longitude (in 1E6 degrees) should be >= 0 and <= 360E6

ct:Test.name: RangeLongitudeSigned6
ct:Test.description: The longitude (in 1E6 degrees) should be >= -180E6 and <= 180E6

ct:Test.name: RangeMicroSecond
ct:Test.description: This value should hold the number of microseconds since the start of the second, maximum value 999999

ct:Test.name: RangePIFFileVersion
ct:Test.description: The version number should be between 1 and 9999

ct:Test.name: RangePIFSPFVersion
ct:Test.description: The version number should be between 1 and 9999

ct:Test.name: RangeSecond
ct:Test.description: This value should hold the number of seconds since the start of the day, maximum value 86400

ct:Test.name: RayCalibrationResultIs2
ct:Test.description: This value should be 2 such that the calibration is valid for atmo and ground echo

ct:Test.name: RQDestinationEnum
ct:Test.description: The destination should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: RQParameterRadixEnum
ct:Test.description: The Request Parameter radix should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Tests.ct:Test: str(.) == "Decimal" || str(.) == "Hexadecimal" || str(.) == "Octal" || str(.) == "Degrees" || str(.) == "Radians" || str(.) == "Raw" || str(.) == ""

ct:Test.name: RQParameterRepresentationEnum
ct:Test.description: The Request Parameter representation type should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: RQSourceEnum
ct:Test.description: The source should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: RQStatusEnum
ct:Test.description: The request status should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Test.name: RQTypeEnum
ct:Test.description: The request type should be one of the allowed enumeration values

ct:Tests.ct:Test: str(.) == "Real-time Sequence" || str(.) == "Time-tagged Sequence" || str(.) == "Orbital Angle tagged Sequence" || str(.) == "Orbital Time tagged Sequence" || str(.) == "Ground Station Job" || str(.) == "MAES Event"

ct:Test.name: RsCorrectionsSignificant
ct:Test.description: Field should be zero

ct:Test.name: TimeNotZero
ct:Test.description: Time shouldn't be zero

ct:Test.name: TimeWithinMphSensingPeriod
ct:Test.description: The time stamp of a record should be within the product's MPH validity start and stop time

ct:Test.name: UniqueInList
ct:Test.description: Parameter name should not occur more than once

ct:Test.name: ValidityPeriodOrder
ct:Test.description: Validity start time should be before or equal to validity stop time

ct:Test.name: ValueGreaterThanOrEqualTo06
ct:Test.description: The value should be greater than or equal to 0.6

ct:Test.name: ValueGreaterThanOrEqualTo1
ct:Test.description: The value should be greater than or equal to 1

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualToMinus06
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to -0.6

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo001
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 0.01

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo01
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 0.1

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo1
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 1.0

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo1p5
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 1.5

ct:Test.name: ValueGreaterThanOrEqualTo4
ct:Test.description: The value should be greater than or equal to 4

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo25
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 25.0

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo60
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 60.0

ct:Test.name: ValueLessThanOrEqualTo200
ct:Test.description: The value should be less than or equal to 200

ct:Test.name: ValueOfCountAttributeForParent
ct:Test.description: The value for the count attribute of the parent List_of_... element should equal the number of occurences of this element

ct:Test.name: ValueTestDHO
ct:Test.description: The value should be 'D', 'H', 'O', 'd', 'h' or 'o'

ct:Test.name: ValueTestNotZero
ct:Test.description: The value shouldn't be zero

ct:Test.name: ValueTestRE
ct:Test.description: The value should be 'R', 'E', 'r' or 'e'

ct:Test.name: ZmaxGreaterThanZminPlus5000
ct:Test.description: The value of Z_max should be greater than Z_min+5000

ct:Test.name: ZrefmaxGreaterThanorEqualToZmax
ct:Test.description: The value of Zref_max should be greater or equal to Z_max
